name: ai-coding-agent-protocol
description: Comprehensive AI-driven development workflow (GODMODE v4.0) with 17 modular slash commands, 21 specialized agents (17 review + 4 research), knowledge compounding, OWASP security checklists, 13-agent smart selection Fresh Eyes review, brainstorm and plan deepening, and structured phases for planning, execution, and finalization.
features: 17 modular slash commands with hybrid invocation (interactive + direct)
21 specialized agents (17 review + 4 research) with smart selection
Knowledge compounding — capture and reuse solved problems (docs/solutions/)
Plan deepening with massive parallel research (10-20+ agents)
Multi-agent plan review with adversarial validation
13-agent smart selection Fresh Eyes Review (zero-context for unbiased review)
Dual tracking: file-based .todos/ AND GitHub issues
Living implementation plans with progress tracking
PRD templates (Lite and Full) with spec-flow analysis
Context-efficient design (behavioral triggers, not documentation bloat)
